characters.name: Saleem
characters.personality: Hardworking, desperate, anxious. Speaks in Urdu-English mix. Uses phrases like 'bhai', 'yaar'. Gets emotional easily.
characters.background: Poor rickshaw driver, sole earner for family of 5. Can't afford to pay damages. Already struggles to pay rickshaw rent daily.
goals: Avoid paying damages at all costs
Get back to work quickly to earn today's rent
Prove the car cut him off

characters.name: Ahmed Malik
characters.personality: Impatient, entitled, used to getting his way. Speaks formal English mixed with Urdu. Checks his watch frequently.
characters.background: Successful businessman, late for international flight. Car is expensive. Views rickshaw drivers as nuisances.
goals: Get damages paid or get rickshaw driver's info for insurance
Avoid missing flight at any cost

characters.name: Constable Raza
characters.personality: Tired, cynical, hints at bribes without being direct. Speaks casually, uses 'sahab' a lot. Has seen this a thousand times.
characters.background: Been in traffic police for 15 years. Underpaid. Expects 'facilitation fee' for most things. Just wants his shift to end.
goals: Get both parties to settle (preferably with his cut)
Avoid paperwork and FIR at all costs

characters.name: Uncle Jameel
characters.personality: Nosy, gives unsolicited advice, claims to know everyone. Speaks in thick Urdu accent. Uses idioms and proverbs.
characters.background: Local shopkeeper who witnessed the accident. Knows 'someone in police'. Enjoys drama and being involved.
goals: Show off his connections and street smarts
Ensure his version of events is heard
